personal-portfolio.description: A self-initiated portfolio project developed from scratch using web technologies, demonstrating problem-solving skills and programming expertise in both Linux and Windows environments.

detail.longDescription:
Role: Full-Stack Developer | Self-Initiated Project

This personal portfolio was fully developed by me using web technologies and my practical experience with Linux and Windows environments. I didn't rely on external templates or frameworks — instead, I used logical thinking, problem-solving skills, and common sense shaped by my background in programming (C and Python) to design and implement every part of this website. I also made use of AI-assisted tools such as Vibe Coding and Gemini for suggestions, debugging, and productivity boosts.

Attention was also given to security practices, including implementing a secure contact form featuring backend processing, spam prevention via hCaptcha, and input sanitization.

View the code →
features: Developed the site structure using HTML5 and React.js, styled with Tailwind CSS, and built with Vite.
Designed and implemented an interactive canvas-based background with dynamic nodes responsive to user interaction.
Applied knowledge of DOM manipulation, event handling, and the Canvas API to create smooth animations.
Built a fully responsive design from scratch using mobile-first principles, flexible grids, and smooth UI/UX transitions, inspired by neural network structures.
Developed all features independently while managing the development environment on both Linux and Windows.
Used Git for version control and consistent project tracking.
Applied structured logic and reasoning, inspired by my programming background, to organize the code and solve implementation challenges.
Implemented a secure contact form using a serverless backend function, environment variables for secrets, input sanitization (preventing common injection exploits), and hCaptcha spam protection.
challenges: Made complex canvas animations run smoothly across both desktop and mobile devices.
Achieved a responsive and accessible design with intuitive user interaction.
Optimized performance and rendering using requestAnimationFrame and efficient asset handling.
